name: How my father went to school
name_original: How my father went to school
description:
<< A short project programmed in C++ (with SFML core) >>

Inspired by Crossy Road for Android/IOS. Made by some members of BaconxPogo team. You play as a man/woman who tried to cross as many streets as possible (basically endless run) to get to school.

  • WS: Move up or down lanes
  • AD: Move left or right on lane
  • Mouse: Interact with pause button and GUI.
